languages.text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.
languages.original_text:
Можно использовать только на противников, на которых действует эффект "неоконченное дело". Этот эффект накладывается на противников, у которых осталось менее 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, атакованных союзниками {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g} (но не им самим).
Мастер-тактик немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночную{/g} атаку в ближнем или дальнем бою. Эта атака не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}, наносит половину от максимального урона оружия, а также {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} дополнительного урона.

traits.locale_text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the Tactician's allies (but not by the Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +<u>(Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> damage.

The Tactician immediately attacks the target with a single shot or strike. This attack does not count towards the limit of the attacks per turn, deals half of the weapon's maximum Damage, with an additional the Tactician's BS bonus Damage. Can only be used on enemies with the Unfinished Business effect.

The Tactician immediately attacks the target with a single shot or strike. This attack does not count towards the limit of the attacks per turn and deals half of the weapon's maximum damage with an additional Tactician's BS bonus damage. Can only be used on enemies with the Unfinished Business effect.

Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the Tactician's allies (but not by the Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

languages.text:
Можно использовать только на противников, на которых действует эффект "неоконченное дело". Этот эффект накладывается на противников, у которых осталось менее 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, атакованных союзниками {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g} (но не им самим).
Мастер-тактик немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночную{/g} атаку в ближнем или дальнем бою. Эта атака не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}, наносит половину от максимального урона оружия, а также {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} дополнительного урона.
languages.original_text: Can be used only on enemies with the Unfinished Business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the Tactician's allies (but not by the Tactician) and have less than 50% of their maximum wounds left. The Tactician immediately attacks the target with a single shot or strike. This attack does not count toward the limit of the attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, deals half of the weapon's maximum damage, with an additional (Tactician's BS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) damage.

traits.locale_text: Можно использовать только на противников, на которых действует эффект Неоконченное дело. Этот эффект накладывается на противников, у которых осталось менее 50% от максимального запаса здоровья, атакованных союзниками тактика (но не им самим). Тактик немедленно совершает одиночную атаку в ближнем или дальнем бою. Эта атака не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, наносит половину от максимального урона оружия, а также {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ДБ тактика дополнительного урона.

Можно использовать только на противников, на которых действует эффект Неоконченное дело. Этот эффект накладывается на противников, у которых осталось менее 50% от максимального запаса здоровья, атакованных союзниками тактика (но не им самим). Тактик немедленно совершает одиночную атаку в ближнем или дальнем бою. Эта атака не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, наносит половину от максимального урона оружия, а также {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ДБ тактика дополнительного урона.

Можно использовать только на противников, на которых действует эффект Неоконченное дело. Этот эффект накладывается на противников, у которых осталось менее 50% от максимального запаса здоровья, атакованных союзниками тактика (но не им самим). Тактик немедленно совершает одиночную атаку в ближнем или дальнем бою. Эта атака не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, наносит половину от максимального урона оружия, а также {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} дополнительного урона.

languages.text: 此能力只能对带有未竟之事效果的敌人使用。此能力的目标必须被{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}的盟友攻击过（但未被战术专家攻击过），且当前生命值不足{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的50%。 战术专家会立刻使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}或打击来攻击该目标。此次攻击不计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合攻击{/g}次数上限，造成武器最大伤害的一半，同时额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}点伤害。
languages.original_text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text: 此能力只能对带有未竟之事效果的敌人使用。此能力的目标必须被战术专家的盟友攻击过（但未被战术专家攻击过），且当前生命值不足{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的50%。 战术专家会立刻使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}或打击来攻击该目标。此次攻击不计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合攻击{/g}次数上限，造成武器最大伤害的一半，额外造成（战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）点伤害。

此能力只能对带有未竟之事效果的敌人使用。此能力的目标必须被战术专家的盟友攻击过（但未被战术专家攻击过），且当前生命值不足{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的50%。 战术专家会立刻使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}或打击来攻击该目标。此次攻击不计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合攻击{/g}次数上限，造成武器最大伤害的一半，额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}点伤害。

此能力只能对带有未竟之事效果的敌人使用。此能力的目标必须被{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}的盟友攻击过（但未被战术专家攻击过），且当前生命值不足{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的50%。 战术专家会立刻使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}或打击来攻击该目标。此次攻击不计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合攻击{/g}次数上限，造成武器最大{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的一半，同时额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}点伤害。

languages.text: Solo puede utilizarse con enemigos afectados por el efecto de Asuntos pendientes. Este efecto se aplica a los enemigos que han sido atacados por los aliados del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} (pero no por el propio maestro táctico) y a los que les quedan menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. El maestro táctico ataca inmediatamente al objetivo con {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} o golpe. Este ataque no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g} e inflige la mitad del daño máximo del arma, con un daño adicional de +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.
languages.original_text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text: Solo puede utilizarse con enemigos afectados por el efecto de Asuntos pendientes. Este efecto se aplica a los enemigos que han sido atacados por los aliados del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} (pero no por el propio maestro táctico) y a los que les quedan menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. El maestro táctico ataca inmediatamente al objetivo con {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} o golpe. Este ataque no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g} e inflige la mitad del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} máximo del arma, con un daño adicional de +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.

Solo puede utilizarse con enemigos afectados por el efecto de Asuntos pendientes. Este efecto se aplica a los enemigos que han sido atacados por los aliados del táctico (pero no por el propio táctico) y a los que les quedan menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. El táctico ataca inmediatamente al objetivo con {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}un solo disparo{/g} o golpe. Este ataque no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g} e inflige la mitad del daño máximo del arma, con un daño adicional de {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.

languages.text:
Kann nur auf Feinde mit dem Effekt Unerledigte Aufgaben angewendet werden. Diesen Effekt erleiden Feinde, die von den Verbündeten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g} angegriffen wurden (aber nicht vom Meistertaktiker selbst) und weniger als 50 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} übrig haben.
Der Meistertaktiker greift das Ziel augenblicklich mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g} oder -schlag an. Dieser Angriff wird dem Limit der {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffe pro Zug{/g} nicht angerechnet. Er fügt die Hälfte des Maximal-Schadens der Waffe zu und einen Zusatzschaden von +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.
languages.original_text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text:
Kann nur auf Feinde mit dem Effekt Unerledigte Aufgaben angewendet werden. Diesen Effekt erleiden Feinde, die von den Verbündeten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g} angegriffen wurden (aber nicht vom Meistertaktiker selbst) und weniger als 50 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} übrig haben.
Der Meistertaktiker greift das Ziel augenblicklich mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g} oder -schlag an. Dieser Angriff wird dem Limit der {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffe pro Zug{/g} nicht angerechnet. Er fügt die Hälfte des Maximal-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} der Waffe zu und einen Zusatzschaden von +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.

Kann nur auf Feinde mit dem Effekt Unerledigte Aufgaben angewendet werden. Dieser Effekt zielt auf Feinde ab, die von den Verbündeten des Taktikers angegriffen wurden (aber nicht durch den Taktiker selbst) und weniger als 50 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} übrig haben. Der Taktiker greift das Ziel augenblicklich mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g} oder -schlag an. Dieser Angriff wird dem Limit der {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffe pro Runde{/g} nicht angerechnet. Er fügt die Hälfte des Maximalschadens der Waffe zu und einen Zusatzschaden von {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.

languages.text: Uniquement utilisable sur les ennemis qui sont sous l'effet de Travail inachevé. Cet effet s'applique aux ennemis qui ont été attaqués par les alliés du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} (mais pas par le maître tacticien) et dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} est inférieure à 50 %. Le maître tacticien attaque immédiatement la cible en utilisant un tir {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} ou une frappe ponctuelle. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g} et inflige la moitié des dégâts maximum de l'arme, avec un supplément de dégâts de +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.
languages.original_text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text: Uniquement utilisable sur les ennemis qui sont sous l'effet de Travail Inachevé. Cet effet s'applique aux ennemis qui ont été attaqués par les alliés du Tacticien (mais pas par le Tacticien) et dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} est inférieure à 50 %. Le Tacticien attaque immédiatement la cible en utilisant un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}tir au coup par coup{/g} ou une frappe ponctuelle. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g} et inflige la moitié des dégâts maximum de l'arme, avec un supplément de dégâts de ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g} du Tacticien).

Uniquement utilisable sur les ennemis qui sont sous l'effet de Travail Inachevé. Cet effet s'applique aux ennemis qui ont été attaqués par les alliés du Tacticien (mais pas par le Tacticien) et dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} est inférieure à 50 %. Le Tacticien attaque immédiatement la cible en utilisant un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}tir au coup par coup{/g} ou une frappe ponctuelle. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g} et inflige la moitié des dégâts maximum de l'arme, avec un supplément de dégâts de {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.

Uniquement utilisable sur les ennemis qui sont sous l'effet de Travail Inachevé. Cet effet s'applique aux ennemis qui ont été attaqués par les alliés du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Maître Tacticien{/g} (mais pas par le Maître Tacticien) et dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} est inférieure à 50 %. Le Maître Tacticien attaque immédiatement la cible en utilisant un tir {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} ou une frappe ponctuelle. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g} et inflige la moitié des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} maximum de l'arme, avec un supplément de dégâts de +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}.

languages.text:
やり残した仕事効果が付与された敵にのみ使用できる。この効果は{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}の味方に攻撃され（ただし、戦略の達人によっては攻撃されていない）、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の50%未満の傷が残っている敵に付与される。
戦略の達人は即座にターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}または攻撃で攻撃する。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターンごと{/g}の攻撃数上限にはカウントされず、武器の最大ダメージの半分に加えて+{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}のダメージを与える。
languages.original_text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text:
やり残した仕事効果が付与された敵にのみ使用できる。この効果は{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}の味方に攻撃され（ただし、戦略の達人によっては攻撃されていない）、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の50%未満の傷が残っている敵に付与される。
戦略の達人は即座にターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}または攻撃で攻撃する。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターンごと{/g}の攻撃数上限にはカウントされず、武器の最大ダメージの半分に加えて+{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}のダメージを与える。

未完の仕事効果が付与された敵にのみ使用できる。この効果は戦術家の味方の味方に攻撃され（ただし、戦術家によっては攻撃されていない）、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の50%未満の体力が残っている敵に付与される。 戦術家は即座にターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}または攻撃で攻撃する。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターンごとの攻撃数{/g}上限にはカウントされず、武器の最大ダメージの半分に加えて{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}のダメージを与える。

未完の仕事効果が付与された敵にのみ使用できる。この効果は{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}の味方に攻撃され（ただし、戦略の達人によっては攻撃されていない）、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の50%未満の体力が残っている敵に付与される。 戦略の達人は即座にターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}または攻撃で攻撃する。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターンごと{/g}の攻撃数上限にはカウントされず、武器の最大{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の半分に加えて+{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}のダメージを与える。

languages.text:
Yalnızca bitmemiş iş etkisine sahip düşmanlarda kullanılabilir. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g}'in dost birimlerinin saldırısına uğramış ve sağlığı {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %50'sinin altına düşmüş düşmanlara uygulanır.
Usta Taktisyen, hedefe anında {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} veya tek yakın dövüş saldırısı yapar. Bu saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz. Silahın maksimum hasarının yarısını verir. Ayrıca ilave +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} hasar oluşturur.
languages.original_text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies (but not by the Master Tactician) and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing half of the weapon's maximum damage and an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.
